ModMetaData.name: Torches and Braziers (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Sovereign,Elseud
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://img.litet.net/logos/Info.png[/img] Update of Sovereign,Elseuds mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3030814279
[img]https://img.litet.net/logos/Notice.png[/img]
[table] [tr][td][url=https://discord.gg/h5TY6DA][img]https://img.litet.net/logos/Discord.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/TorchesAndBraziers][img]https://img.litet.net/logos/Github.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://img.litet.net/logos/SafeToAdd.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://img.litet.net/logos/RemoveMayWork.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://img.litet.net/logos/OriginalDescription.png[/img] [img]https://img.litet.net/8eUsAEb.png[/img] This mod adds a bunch of torches and braziers depending on active mods. Currently this mod includes 3 different kind of fires. If you have more suggestions,feel free to leave a comment.
[img]https://img.litet.net/nvdraJb.png[/img]
[img]https://img.litet.net/Z5po5ow.png[/img]
[img]https://img.litet.net/IIyPtId.png[/img] [img]https://img.litet.net/MzJ01Wf.png[/img] [img]https://img.litet.net/2KqNcVz.png[/img] [img]https://img.litet.net/U0sQUzW.png[/img]
[b]Royalty[/b] activates the royal brazier ingame
[b]Biotech[/b] for the Blood and Tox variant.
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2863526335] Lag Free Torches and More [/url] [i] My mod doesn't need fuel by default.It's not needed but compatible nonetheless[/i]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3542508261] Nephilim Xenotype [/url] [i] unlocks the holy flame[/i]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=2023507013] Vanilla Expanded Framework [/url] [i] gives each torch and brazier an additional moodbuff depending on gene.[/i]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2938820380] Vanilla Factions Expanded - Empire [/url] [i] the brazier are compatible with custom royalty titles.[/i]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2983471725] Vanilla Races Expanded - Waster[/url] [i] gets the mood buff[/i]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2963116383] Vanilla Races Expanded - Sanguophage [/url] [i] gets the mood buff[/i]
[img]https://img.litet.net/sZgz06c.png[/img] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561199377833097/myworkshopfiles/] Elseud [/url] provided me with the brazier logo in the preview.
Sl4vP0weR C#
[img]https://img.litet.net/logos/ReportingIssues.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Always post your log using the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Log Uploader[/url] [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/changelog/3658303543][img]https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/emipa606/TorchesAndBraziers?label=latest%20version&style=plastic&color=9f1111&labelColor=black[/img][/url] | tags: light sources
